# QR Service API
> Generate, decode, and track QR codes. Agent-first with zero signup.

## Base URL
/api/v1

## Quick Start
1. Generate QR: POST /api/v1/qr/generate {"content": "https://example.com"}
2. Decode QR: POST /api/v1/qr/decode (multipart, file=image)
3. Tracked QR: POST /api/v1/qr/tracked {"target_url": "...", "name": "..."}
   - Returns manage_token + short URL with scan analytics

## Endpoints

### Stateless QR (no auth)
- POST /qr/generate — generate QR code (PNG/SVG, styles: square/rounded/dots)
- POST /qr/decode — decode QR from image
- POST /qr/batch — batch generate (up to 50)
- POST /qr/template/{type} — generate from template (wifi/vcard/url)

### Tracked QR (auth required)
- POST /qr/tracked — create tracked QR with short URL (returns manage_token)
- GET /qr/tracked/{id}/stats — scan analytics
- DELETE /qr/tracked/{id} — delete tracked QR

### Short URLs
- GET /r/{code} — redirect (records scan event)

### Utility
- GET /health — health check
- GET /openapi.json — OpenAPI 3.0 spec
- GET /qr/view?data=... — stateless QR image viewer

## Auth
Tracked QR: Bearer token or X-API-Key header (manage_token from create)
Stateless QR: no auth required

## OpenAPI
Full spec: GET /api/v1/openapi.json

## Source
https://github.com/Humans-Not-Required/qr-service
